verses.roman:
pathe paṇḍitere svarūpa kahena vacana
"parīkṣite prabhu tomāre kailā upekṣaṇa

synonyms: pathe—on the way; paṇḍitere—unto Gadādhara Paṇḍita; svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara; kahena vacana—said some words; parīkṣite—to test; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tomāre—you; kailā upekṣaṇa—neglected.
translation: On the way, Svarūpa Dāmodara said to Gadādhara Paṇḍita, "Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu wanted to test you. Therefore He neglected you.
